articles.description: SpaceX's ambitious vision for Starship extends beyond Earth's orbit, with plans to use the spacecraft for missions to the Moon and ultimately to Mars.
articles.content:
In a significant step towards its third test flight, SpaceX's Flight 3 Starship successfully completed a full-duration static fire test with all six of its Raptor engines. 
This test took place at t… [+1707 chars]
